Elizabeth:WildCard.NAME: Wild Card
Elizabeth:WildCard.DESCRIPTION: Switch Arcana. NL Soulbound. NL Retain. NL You can only use Wild Card once per turn.

Elizabeth:Fool.NAME: Fool
Elizabeth:Fool.DESCRIPTION: Play the bonus of the first 2 Persona cards you play this turn.

Elizabeth:Empress.NAME: Empress
Elizabeth:Empress.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dex. NL Lose it upon Arcana Switch.

Elizabeth:AllOutAttackYes.NAME: Attack
Elizabeth:AllOutAttackYes.DESCRIPTION: All Out Attack! NL Undown ALL enemies.
